statements: SELECT * FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, milestone_completed FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_completed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_id = 3 ORDER BY milestone_completed ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_id = 1 ORDER BY milestone_completed DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_achievements > 5;
SELECT achievement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_achievements GROUP BY achievement_name ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name, milestone_completed FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_completed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND milestone_completed > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY player_id ASC, milestone_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM player_milestones WHERE milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY achievement_name ASC;
SELECT milestone_name FROM player_milestones WHERE player_id = 3 AND milestone_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%complete%' ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, milestone_date FROM player_milestones WHERE milestone_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements INNER JOIN player_milestones ON player_achievements.player_id = player_milestones.player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_achievements > 2;
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 'f63adf37-c29e-43d6-a404-2d98d3b9b2b5';
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE player_id = '5d1f7a8b-7874-4e38-a346-83bb18fefdee' ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, total_achievements, total_milestones FROM player_progress WHERE experience_points > 10000;
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) as total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM milestones WHERE milestone_date >= '2021-01-01' AND milestone_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(experience_points) as total_experience FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_name DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_progress FROM milestones WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND reward_name LIKE '%bonus%';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%Gold%' ORDER BY achievement_name ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_progress FROM milestones WHERE milestone_progress < 50 ORDER BY milestone_progress DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_description FROM rewards WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player JOIN rewards ON player.player_id = rewards.player_id WHERE player.player_level >= 10 AND reward_description LIKE '%bonus%' ORDER BY player.player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_experience > 1000;
SELECT player_name, player_join_date FROM players WHERE player_join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC, player_experience ASC;
SELECT * FROM achievements LIMIT 5;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC, player_experience DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_join_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY player_experience DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievements_completed) AS total_achievements FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_achievements > 3;
